column4: I have Jaunty install on this PC and I have VNC setup using Vino, but when I connect from my work, I can't open anything by clicking with the mouse.
I can see my desktop and I can move the mouse but it will not let me click or open anything, Help?
I have Jaunty install on this PC and I have VNC setup using Vino, but when I connect from my work, I can't open anything by clicking with the mouse, Help?
I already have it set so I can control my desktop remotely as well
system > preferences  > remote desktop > x allow other users to control desktop
I already have it set to allow others to control the desktop
how about , "you must confirm each access to this machine"
I made sure to uncheck that option
I set a password for myself and it connects just fine, I just can't click on anything even though it will let me move the mouse.
what  vnc client do you use ?
realvnc from work although I did try tightvnc as well and got the same results.
if it makes any difference my work uses all windows XP PC's.
I was able to do it with Hardy just fine using realvnc, but ever since I upgraded to Intrepid and then Jaunty It doesn't work right
i'd try to disable desktop effects
you think that might be lagging the connection
the desktop effects never messed with the connect when I did on Hardy, why would it effect it on Jaunty?
unless you turn off desktop effects it wont work, there is known bug in jaunty when using nvidia-restricted driver and compiz desktop
